/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street itself is a two-lane road, flanked by concrete barriers on either side, guiding the flow of traffic. Streetlights stand sentinel along the road, ready to bathe the street in light as dusk falls. 

In the distance, buildings rise, their details softened by the distance. They add a touch of urbanity to the scene, hinting at the city's vibrant life beyond the frame of the image. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow. 

The image is a blend of urban and natural elements, with the man-made structures coexisting with the natural beauty of the sky. It's a snapshot of a moment in Beijing, a city where tradition and modernity intertwine.
